headline: Riyadh Air CEO says airline supply chain issues starting to improve
summary: MIAMI (Reuters) -Supply chains for major planemakers Boeing and Airbus are showing signs of moderate improvement, the chief executive of Saudi start-up Riyadh Air said on Thursday.  The causes ranged from general disruption emanating from the COVID-19 pandemic to industrial action at Boeing which caused a seven-week halt to most jet production last fall.  "But am I seeing signs of moderate improvement - I honestly have to say, yes I do."
